body:
- Allow sending location name
- Move floating button on manage channel and feed screens to action bar
- Manage channels and feeds
Fixes in parsing of feeds (string vs array)

- Optimize name and text content
- Animated gifs now work in the gallery view too
- Do not crash when zooming on image in gallery
- Developer: settings to view the JSON response of post list
- Render reference content for replies, likes and reposts if available
- Trim content so less space is used for a single reader item
- Scroll back to item row in reader when 'close' button is toggled
- Allow sending a title for a file uploaded to the media endpoint
- Hide post types if not supported or enabled on the micropub server
- If scaling is disabled, use the default preview size of 1000 so the phone does not run out of memory

- Do not show duplicate images
- Timeline: show 'follow-of' types
- Do not crash the timeline when clicking 'Load more' twice
- Scaling images is now an optional setting so original images can be uploaded if wanted
- Developer: settings to view the JSON response of channels, timeline or a single item in the reader

- Send posts in UTF-8 (emoji and other special characters will now work)
- Do not send numerical indexes for multi-valued properties

- Adjust categories parsing
- Allow to watch videos in reader
- Allow finding media endpoint from link tag
- Rename 'Media' to 'Upload'

- Show 'new' indicator
- Fix sending syndication targets
- Add all needed scopes when authenticating
- Go to sign-in screen when no account is found
- Better back navigation for images and audio
- Pass along altitude in geo location
- Fix entryId check in timeline for read all functionality
- On the sign-in screen, existing accounts are shown as well

- Allow autocomplete of tags
- Support location visibility
- Fix for channels returning 'unread' or false/true

- Allow deleting an entry from the reader
- Optimize name/content/summary handling
- Allow hiding preview image in reader
- Allow viewing multiple images
- Add paging on posts screen
- 'Refresh configuration' now also refreshes microsub and micropub endpoints

- When editing a draft, set 'Save as draft' checked
- Do not crash on empty _id property in timeline
Fix crash on post saving (due to the new draft feature)

- Safe as draft for article, note and reply
- Add link to external post in posts list
- Allow setting limit of posts
- Add issue post type

Important: toggle the 'Refresh configuration' button to refresh the syndication targets 

- allow deleting posts
- allow getting posts and filtering per post-type
- fix RSVP crash

- Fix sending a file to media endpoints
- Support for rendering repost
- Basic support for updating posts (see Settings)

- Cleaner date formatting in timeline
- Check required fields on post types
- Cleaner positioning of 'new'
- Send post status (published or draft)
- Fix uploading portrait images

- Support for media endpoint
- Add maximum image size settings
- Syndication targets are now saved via ?q=config
- Get around a missing account preference
Fixes a crash in Lollipop

- Send location on note, article and event
- Add counter on all textareas
- Use custom tabs for external links
- Consistent styling and design

* Use indigenous.abode.pub for authentication
* Detect connection when trying to post or read channels
* Better styling of micropub overview screen
* A lot of cleanup in code

- Allow multiple accounts - Set focus on title for bookmark and reply when URL is prefilled - Check photo mimetype for compressing
  • Get syndication targets on login - Ignore h-card types in reader - Add image settings

- Create events, RSVP 
- Allow to configure the like/share/repost/reply intents in the share screen 
- Pull to refresh for channels and timelines 
- Various bug fixes and some cleaning in channels
Development release.
